topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f6645c6368720a752a0200#post_54f6645c6368720a752a0200
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f663e86368727dc89e0200#post_54f663e86368727dc89e0200
And it will be glorious.[/bq]
I'm getting pretty severely into history here, but there's only two real ways societies over time change:
1)There is always constant societal change and the society accepts it
2)The society rejects the societal change until something snaps and all hell breaks loose and the society is forced to accept it.

The reason why it's relevant is that when you break it down geek culture was supposed to take over mainstream culture because that's how things happen; something geeky becomes mainstream and the mainstream adopts it; case in point how comic books are now super mainstream and Avengers and Guardians of the Galaxy printed fuck tons of money.

When you get down to it the usa is a extremely geeky nation; it's just that 24/7 news keeps shoving their metaphorical cock down people throats and getting angry that far less people are deepthroating their ideologies.  The reality of it is that the usa is filled to the brim with kinky geeks.

Case in point:
Pokemon:
I'm just going to admit I'm not a fan of pokemon, but the latest sales reports from pokemon show that the majority of people playing pokemon are teens/adults now.  Also the insane amounts of porn.

How mainstream culture depicts it:
"Pokemon is for children and if you look at porn of it you're a filthy neckbeard"
The reality:
The majority of players are young adults and the porn is really popular.



What is probably going to happen in the usa culturally in the next couple of years:
2015:
"Fucking geeks!  Learn your place!"
2016:
"Fuck you!  Fuck you!  Fuck you!"
2017:
"You should check out our cosplay of the week vid!  It's super rad bro!"


Tl:dr; geeks are taking over
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f6686a6368727962a80300#post_54f6686a6368727962a80300
It is very, very much a generational thing. Currently the people in control are all, to generalize a fuckton, baby boomers. These are people for who much of geek culture is some sort of weird, alien thing that they recall as being strictly for kids.

I guess it all comes from the people in charge of, well everything, coming from the time when geeks were still losers
And they refuse to let it go

topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f6694b6368720ad86d0400#post_54f6694b6368720ad86d0400
And that is why things are changing so rapidly; baby boomers are starting to lose power because, not to be rude to anyone, but a lot of them are starting to die off from old age.

When you have a entire generation that defined your society for decades starting to die off due to old age that's going to be a very big change societally.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f646266368720bc6a60400#post_54f646266368720bc6a60400
[bq="uc9"]"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f645576368723c0c240000#post_54f645576368723c0c240000
To put it simply: the people that think incest causes "mutants" are fucking idiots.[/bq]

Not mutans, but there is a high risk in developing psychological problems and some physical anomalies. The more the pairing are more related, the risk increases.

Albus and Ivy actually have a risk, but that risk is insignificant, and the anomalies that the kid could have are not serious.
